name: SKATEBOARD: Hit and Run
description:
Cause problems on purpose! In SKATEBOARD: Hit and Run, you can be a menace to society by wreaking havoc on cops and unhip old people! Evade the police while defacing property for fun, and look fresh while doing it! Be the coolest kid when you get back from summer break, in SKATEBOARD: Hit And Run!

*REQUIRES CONTROLLER*

Please help us gather feedback by completing this google form about your experience! https://forms.gle/TsFyXyEiftz55BEEA

CREDITS: 

Lead: Joshua Watson

Programmers: Joshua Nichols, Jacob Moore, Kevin Green 

Artists: Jade Essary, Ashlea Harmon, Ruthy Kirtley, Madison Farmer, Erik Johnson

Animators: Joeseph Sterling Johnson, Robert Mansfield, Sarah Buckner, Brian Anderson, Zac Clausius
